column4: Kodu dɛ medze w’atamfo bɛyɛ w’ananadzegua."

column2: "EWURADZE befi Zion atsen w’ahoɔdzen poma no: Dzi tum wɔ w’atamfo finimfin."
"Wo man dze hɔnho bɛma ɔpɛdo wɔ wo tumdzi da mu: Krɔnkrɔnyɛ n’ahoɔfɛw mu
column3: Na wo mberantsɛ bɛba ama wo."
na ɔrenndan no; Ɔwo eyɛ ɔsɔfo daa Wɔ Melkizedek mbrɔn do."
Ɔbɔbobɔ ehwira ahemfo mu wɔ n’ebufuw da no mu."
Ɔbɛma efun ahyɛ mbea no do ma; Ɔbɔbɔ ehwira tsirmu wɔ asaase pii mu."

column2: "Ɔbɔnom kwan do ɔwora no bi: Dɛm ntsi na ɔbɛma ne tsir do."
